casebody.data:
AUTOMOTIVE FINANCE CORPORATION dba AFC Automotive Finance Corporation dba AFC, Appellant-Plaintiff,
v.
THORNTON MOTOR COMPANY, INC. dba Thornton Motor Company ; Alan William Thornton aka Alan W. Thornton aka Alan Thornton; and Leslie Diane Thornton aka Leslie D. Thornton aka Leslie Sahzman Thornton aka Leslie Thornton aka Leslie S. Thornton, Appellees-Defendants Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-CC-571 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED August 22, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

VAIDIK , C.J.

Reversed and remanded.

PYLE, J., Concurs.

BARNES, Sr.J., Concurs.
